title: Export Data Functionality Released
description: Users can now export their submitted requests, votes, and comments in CSV or JSON format. Perfect for personal record keeping and data analysis.

title: Rich Text Editor Now Available
description: The description field now supports rich text formatting including bold, italic, links, and code blocks. This makes feature requests much clearer and more detailed.

title: Enhanced Comment Threading
description: Comments now support nested replies with better visual hierarchy. This improves discussion flow and makes conversations easier to follow.

title: Improved Vote Visualization
description: Vote buttons now have smoother animations and better visual feedback. The voting experience feels more responsive and engaging.

title: Performance Optimizations
description: Significant improvements to page load times and search responsiveness. The platform now handles large datasets much more efficiently.
